name: No Body (Fabzter)
description:
Summary:

No Body is a platformer where the player takes control of a ghost out in town, looking to get wasted at the nearest pub, but obliged to posses one unfortunate body in order to do so. Throw the poor lad around in order to reach the end of each level! Or simply enjoy watching him suffer!

How to play :

-Your goal is to reach the DOOR at the end of each level.

-Throw around your victim so as to interact with objects.

-The body’s inertia increases/decreases depending on the distance between the ghost and him.

-Take care of the poor guy! In case of death, it’s back to the beginning of the level for you!

Controls :

Arrows – Moves the ghost around

Space – Throws the body

P – Pause/game menu
